title: Playing it Out
description: The first in the Adrenaline SeriesAfter completing a sold out nationwide tour Declan Kane, frontman for the popular rock band Adrenaline is ready for some well deserved time off. The last few months have left him restless, anxious for something he can’t put a name on until he lays eyes on her. Reece Becker is a high school english teacher just starting her summer vacation with the goal of finally getting some writing done when she not so accidentally bumps into Declan at a local bar. Despite some initial reluctance, Reece is unable to resist the instant chemistry she feels with the sexy rocker.But when the couple’s easy going relationship takes an unexpected turn and past insecurities come to the surface, will Reece and Declan lose their chance at true love, or take the risk of playing it out?
author: Morgan O'Hara
